    Reference

    All functions

    canada_cd_pop

    Canadian Census District Populations

    canada_cd_types

    Additional census division information for Canada

    cbg_pop

    Unweighted Population by Census Block Group

    county_pop

    Unweighted Population by County

    distancing

    Example Stay-at-Home Data

    expand_cat_json()

    Expand and collapse a categorical JSON column

    expand_integer_json()

    Expand and collapse an integer JSON column

    expand_open_hours()

    Expands the open_hours variable in the Core file

    find_date()

    Find the date in a SafeGraph AWS-formatted filepath

    fips_from_cbg()

    Pull state and county FIPS (US) or province and census division (CA) from CBG code

    fips_to_names

    State and county names by FIPS codes

    graph_template()

    Produce a nice-looking graph of foot traffic growth over time

    growth_over_time()

    Track foot traffic by group over time

    hb_shrink()

    Hierarchical Bayes Shrinkage

    link_poi_naics()

    Use a Core Places file to Create a POI-NAICS crosswalk

    ma()

    Seven-Day Moving Average

    naics_2

    NAICS 4-Digit Code Titles

    naics_4

    NAICS 4-Digit Code Titles

    naics_codes

    NAICS Code Titles

    norm

    Example Normalization Data

    panel

    Example Panel Information Data

    patterns_lookup()

    SafeGraph File Lookup

    pat_naics pat_naics

    Example Patterns Data Aggregated by NAICS Code

    processing_template()

    Perform basic processing and preparation of visits_by_day data

    rbind_by_list_pos()

    Row-binds data.tables in a list of lists

    read_core()

    Read SafeGraph Core

    read_distancing()

    Read in Stay-at-Home Data

    read_many_csvs()

    Read and row-bind many CSVs

    read_many_patterns()

    Read and row-bind many patterns files

    read_many_shop()

    Read and row-bind many files from the SafeGraph Shop

    read_patterns()

    Read SafeGraph Patterns

    read_shop()

    Read a ZIP file with patterns and other data as it comes from the SafeGraph Shop

    safegraph_api()

    Download SafeGraph data from the API

    safegraph_aws()

    Download SafeGraph data from AWS COVID Response

    sample_size_adjust()

    Adjust SafeGraph Data for Sampling Size Differences

    scale_to_date()

    Scale data relative to its value on a date

    scale_yoy()

    Calculate year-on-year change

    state_info

    State Information
